vialab.mouseToTUIO

Class Finger

  • java.lang.Object
    • vialab.mouseToTUIO.Finger

  • public class Finger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds touch event information associated with the same session ID (e.g.all the information associated with someone placing their finger on the screen, dragging it, then removing it.)

    University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Finger(int sID, int xPos, int yPos)
      Touch Constructor, creates a touch cursor with the given session ID, and coordinates.

      Returns the path of the touch cursor
      java.awt.Point getPosition()
      Returns the current position of the touch cursor
      void stop()
      Resets the touch cursors speed, acceleration and time of last update
